content: >designer kim guzman has created an appealing throw with 4 harmonizing shades of one pound in the summer mist throw kim s easy repeating crochet stitch pattern combined with subtle color changes creates a palette of soothing waves of color that will inspire and warm the heart materials caron international s one pound 100% acrylic 16oz/454g 812yds/742m 580 soft sage a 1 skein 613 lavender blue b 1 skein 587 pale green c 1 skein 577 lilac d 1 skein one size us k-10 5 6 5mm or size to obtain gauge yarn needle gauge in pattern 9 single_crochet = 4 /10cm and a 6-row repeat = 3 1/2 /9cm >i have been given written permission to provide the pdf on ravelry i have had far too many emails due to the yarnspirations website being down for maintenance and hope this will solve the problem
